nodes.text: This asteroid field was located in the galaxy on the edge of Guavian Death Space, a region controlled by the Guavian Death Gang. During the First Order/Resistance War, the Colossus, passing through Guavian space, travelled through the asteroid field in an attempt to exit the region without being noticed by the criminal organization. After the space station was spotted and reported by a Guavian scout, its defending forces fought a skirmish with Guavian forces on the edge of the asteroid field.
